question: In 2016, the famous Salma Dam of Afghanistan got renamed. What is it's new name?
explanation: The Salma dam was originally constructed in 1976 on the Hari river basin but was destroyed during the civil wars in Afghanistan. In 2006, India committed to fund the construction of Salma Dam. So, in order to strengthen the relation between two nations, Afghan cabinet decided to rename Salma Dam as Afghan-India Friendship Dam.
